about_the_game:
Descend into the chaotic world of Bullet Blasters, where every run is different, every enemy is unpredictable, and only the strongest warriors survive. Wield the power of Fire, Wind, Lightning, Poison, and Ice as you battle your way from the depths of Hell’s tower base to the divine gates of Heaven.

With fast-paced combat, elemental weaponry, and a procedurally generated battlefield, no two runs are ever the same. Whether you’re fighting solo or teaming up with up to 4 friends in local co-op, Bullet Blasters will test your reflexes, strategy, and mastery over the elements.

🔥 Endless Possibilities, Endless Fun
Procedural generation ensures every level is new, challenging, and unpredictable. No run is ever the same, keeping the action fresh and exciting!

⚡ Master the Elements
Unleash the power of Fire, Wind, Lightning, Poison, and Ice, each with unique effects to crush your enemies in spectacular ways. Combine elements for devastating results!

💀 One Life. One Shot. One Chance.
Every run is do-or-die—wield elemental guns and abilities, adapt to procedurally generated chaos, and fight to survive the ever-changing tower!

🤝 Team Up, Blast Together!
Survive alone or join forces with up to 4 players in local co-op. Strategy, teamwork, and pure bullet chaos will determine if you can make it to the top!

  • Graphics: 8 RDNA 2 CUs, 1.0-1.6GHz
